news.title: Announcing the return of Gentoo donations via Paypal

body.p: The Gentoo Foundation is pleased to announce the return of the Paypal donation link on the www.gentoo.org pages. This link allows you to donate any amount you wish directly to the Foundation. One of the responsibilities of the Foundation is to handle the financial needs of Gentoo and to help fund the further development of Gentoo Linux. More information about funding needs can be found at http://www.gentoo.org/foundation/en/funds.xml. The most immediate funding need that the Foundation has is to raise the $500 opening balance for the Foundation's bank account (and this will remain in the account as the minimum balance). We challenge users and organizations to donate if they can, even the smallest amount counts! Thank you for your continued support of Gentoo Linux!
